TrackingServerName.description: The name of the MLFlow Tracking Server.
TrackingServerName.markdownDescription:
The name of the MLFlow Tracking Server.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9]){0,255}$  
Update requires: Replacement

TrackingServerSize.description: The size of the MLFlow Tracking Server.
TrackingServerSize.markdownDescription:
The size of the MLFlow Tracking Server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Small | Medium | Large  
Update requires: No interruption

MlflowVersion.description: The MLFlow Version used on the MLFlow Tracking Server.
MlflowVersion.markdownDescription:
The MLFlow Version used on the MLFlow Tracking Server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: ^\d+(\.\d+)+$  
Update requires: Some interruptions

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that enables Amazon SageMaker to perform tasks on behalf of the customer.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that enables Amazon SageMaker to perform tasks on behalf of the customer.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-z\-]*:iam::\d{12}:role\/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_\/]+$  
Update requires: Some interruptions

ArtifactStoreUri.description: The Amazon S3 URI for MLFlow Tracking Server artifacts.
ArtifactStoreUri.markdownDescription:
The Amazon S3 URI for MLFlow Tracking Server artifacts.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^s3:\/\/([^\/]+)\/?(.*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

AutomaticModelRegistration.description: A flag to enable Automatic SageMaker Model Registration.
AutomaticModelRegistration.markdownDescription:
A flag to enable Automatic SageMaker Model Registration.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

WeeklyMaintenanceWindowStart.description: The start of the time window for maintenance of the MLFlow Tracking Server in UTC time.
WeeklyMaintenanceWindowStart.markdownDescription:
The start of the time window for maintenance of the MLFlow Tracking Server in UTC time.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 9  
Pattern: ^(Mon|Tue|Wed|Thu|Fri|Sat|Sun):([01]\d|2[0-3]):([0-5]\d)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TrackingServerArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the MLFlow Tracking Server.
TrackingServerArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the MLFlow Tracking Server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-z\-]*:sagemaker:[a-z0-9\-]*:[0-9]{12}:mlflow-tracking-server/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption
